content: the last chain 6 for 2 row make 1sc into each stitch chain 1 and turn after each row fasten_off and leave some yarn to use for sewing position the wings on the side of the body about 3 row down and sew that s it when you are finished with your piece please show me in a review i would really love to see your work if you have any questions or need help i will try my best to help you feel free to contatct me anytime and i will try my best to help you out thank you so much for supporting small
